name: URL Uploader
description: Telegram's best Open Source ALL-In-One Multi Purpose RoBot. Create your Fork now.

WEBHOOK.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks when in env mode

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot token, as a string.

AUTH_USERS.description: allow only pre-defined users to use this bot

AUTH_CHANNEL.description: For Force Subscribe. Paste your Update channel id Eg: -100..

DATABASE_URL.description: Your MongoDB URI. For more: https://youtu.be/nj-lJfkgb6w

HTTP_PROXY.description: proxy for accessing youtube-dl in GeoRestricted Areas. Get your own proxy from https://github.com/rg3/youtube-dl/issues/1091#issuecomment-230163061
